name: Meditations: July 8th
description:
"On July 8th, we met up at the high school tennis courts to play a few matches for fun and grab some Slurpees afterward. Nervously, I mustered the courage to ask her to be my girlfriend. She said yes. Exactly eight years later, to the day, was our wedding day."

Made in under 6 hours for https://meditations.games/
